feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.0.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

I am proud to announce Huntarr now installs on Windows and also installs as a service! Took me 4 tries over the last 3 weeks, probably spending about 30 hours the windows portion alone (keep in mind you can now install for mac also)

Pending quick build issue... will repost.

  • Dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/475 Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.0.5...7.0.6

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.0.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

I am proud to announce Huntarr now installs on Windows and also installs as a service! Took me 4 tries over the last 3 weeks, probably spending about 30 hours the windows portion alone (keep in mind you can now install for mac also)

7.0.7+ now names provides the windows installer a better name when publishing

Pending quick build issue... will repost.

  • Dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/475 Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.0.5...7.0.6

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.0.6...7.0.7

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.0.8
entry.content:
Apprise Notifications Added - Beta (if someone uses apprise, please let me know how it works)

What's Changed

  • Add Apprise notification support by @copilot-swe-agent in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/479

New Contributors

  • @copilot-swe-agent made their first contribution in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/479

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.0.7...7.0.8

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.0.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

Fixed scheduler (note v6 saved items to /config and v7 saves to /config/settings

New Contributors

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.0.7...7.0.9 * Add Apprise notification support by @copilot-swe-agent in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/479

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 7.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Fixed the scheduler and state management. If your on 7.0.0 to 7.0.9, please update or your older processed items will never reprocess. This was due to a move to support windows/mac

  • Dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/493 Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/7.0.9...7.1.0
